component.name: ibm-watsonx-ai
component.title: IBM watsonx.ai
component.description: Interact with IBM watsonx.ai foundation models for text generation, chat, embeddings, and more.
component.label: ai,cloud

spaceId.label: common
spaceId.description: IBM Cloud deployment space ID (alternative to projectId)

wxUrl.label: common
wxUrl.description: The watsonx.ai WX platform URL for tool operations (e.g., https://api.dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/wx)

detectHap.label: producer
detectHap.description: Whether to detect HAP (Harmful, Abusive, Profane content)

detectPii.label: producer
detectPii.description: Whether to detect PII (Personal Identifiable Information)

documentConnectionId.label: producer
documentConnectionId.description: COS connection ID for document storage

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

rerankTopN.label: producer
rerankTopN.description: Number of top results to return for reranking

resultConnectionId.label: producer
resultConnectionId.description: COS connection ID for result storage

returnDocuments.label: producer
returnDocuments.description: Whether to return documents in rerank response

truncateInputTokens.label: producer
truncateInputTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens accepted per input for embeddings. Truncates from the end if exceeded.

autowiredEnabled.label: advanced
autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

logRequests.label: advanced
logRequests.description: Whether to log HTTP requests to the watsonx.ai API

logResponses.label: advanced
logResponses.description: Whether to log HTTP responses from the watsonx.ai API

apiKey.label: security
apiKey.description: IBM Cloud API key for authentication

CamelIBMWatsonxAiInputs.description: The list of inputs for batch operations

CamelIBMWatsonxAiSpaceId.description: The space ID for deployment operations

CamelIBMWatsonxAiSystemMessage.description: The system message for chat (used to build messages if MESSAGES header is not set)

CamelIBMWatsonxAiUserMessage.description: The user message for chat (used to build messages if MESSAGES header is not set, alternative to body)

CamelIBMWatsonxAiTools.description: The tools available for function calling

CamelIBMWatsonxAiRerankTopN.description: Number of top results to return for reranking

CamelIBMWatsonxAiFileName.description: The file name when using InputStream input

CamelIBMWatsonxAiFilePath.description: The file path for extraction or classification (for files already in COS)

CamelIBMWatsonxAiBucketName.description: The COS bucket name for file operations

CamelIBMWatsonxAiUploadSuccess.description: Whether the upload operation was successful

CamelIBMWatsonxAiDeleteSuccess.description: Whether the delete operation was successful

CamelIBMWatsonxAiErrorMessage.description: Error message when classification or extraction fails

CamelIBMWatsonxAiErrorCode.description: Error code when classification or extraction fails

CamelIBMWatsonxAiForecastInputSchema.description: The input schema for time series forecast

CamelIBMWatsonxAiFoundationModelFilter.description: Filter for foundation models or tasks

CamelIBMWatsonxAiToolRegistry.description: Tool registry for chat with tool calling capabilities

CamelIBMWatsonxAiToolCalls.description: List of tool calls requested by the assistant

CamelIBMWatsonxAiHasToolCalls.description: Whether the assistant response contains tool calls

CamelIBMWatsonxAiAssistantMessage.description: The full assistant message from chat response

By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.
